jobs.title: Quantitative Developer wanted for cryptocurrency prop firm (remote position)
jobs.description:
Summary
CryptoAi is a proprietary trading firm focused on the trading of cryptocurrencies. The firm has existed since 2016 and in that time has made significant progress in its quantitative trading department. CryptoAi outperformed the market during 2017 ten fold and incurred 40% of the drawdown compared to 85% seen in the baseline (total market capitalization) during the 2018 retraction. 

The firm's current goals are to continue:
 - Backtesting it’s trading strategies 
 - Building it’s algorithmic trading infrastructure  
 - Developing innovative alphas
 - Developing it’s portfolio management framework
 - Expanding it’s core team and global network 

Current Stack
 - Exchange/Market REST API - Flask/MongoDB/Heroku
 - Quantitative Strategy Development - Python [Zipline/Numpy/Pandas/Scipy]
 - Asset Management Applications- Flask/Django/JavaScript
 - Project management - Slack/Github/Trello
 - Computing - AWS

Candidate Responsibilities
 - Design and Backtesting Low to Medium Frequency Alpha
 - Coordinate with traders and researchers, to understand the alpha, and develop into productionable alpha
 - Deployment and Maintenance of existing infrastructure
 - Feasibility studies, technical analysis and further research on existing alpha, or alpha generated by team

Candidate Profile
 - Masters or PhD from a leading university in a highly quantitative field
 - Highly proficient with coding in Python
 - Experience within the Mid Frequency space
 - Working knowledge of forecasting and data mining techniques, such as linear and non-linear regression analysis, neural networks or support vector machines.
 - Proficiency in back-testing, signal generation, simulation, and statistical techniques
Bonus
 - Previous experience as quant developer/researcher

A prospectus we made a year ago can be found here 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/10QP6ajgWYnxGlHjBWL_Rmf0ueFPmLyha/view?usp=sharing

CryptoAi

jobs.title: Intern At Crypto Currency Fund
jobs.description:
Summary
CryptoAi is a proprietary trading firm focused on the trading of cryptocurrencies. The firm has existed since 2016 and in that time has made significant progress in its quantitative trading department. CryptoAi outperformed the market during 2017 ten fold and incurred 40% of the drawdown compared to 85% seen in the baseline (total market capitalization) during the 2018 retraction. 

Our team is comprised of data scientists and physicists with PhDs and masters 

A prospectus we made a year ago can be found here 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/10QP6ajgWYnxGlHjBWL_Rmf0ueFPmLyha/view?usp=sharing

The firm's current goals are to continue:
 - Backtesting it’s trading strategies 
 - Building it’s algorithmic trading infrastructure  
 - Developing innovative alphas
 - Developing it’s portfolio management framework
 - Expanding it’s core team and scaling the project

There are technically two positions needing to be filled, if necessary we will hire two candidates however the ideal candidate will be able to do both. 
1. Administrative partner 
2. Trading partner 

1. Administrative partner, responsibilities
 - Comprehend the breadth of the project and assist in structuring a roadmap 
 - Keeping things organised and on track (Reorganizing google drive, managing gantt / trello etc) 
 - Keeping leads with potential partners and our network live 
 - Assisting with recruiting

Skills / experience required: 
 - Experience in project management 
 - Experience in business development
 - Excellent written and spoken communication skills
 - Self-directed and quick learner
 - Outstanding time management and organizational skills

2. Trading partner, responsibilities
 - Assisting with manual trading of our system 
 - Collaborating on trade ideas 
 - Building spreadsheets to assist in portfolio management and logging data from our system 

Skills / experience required: 
 - Creative problem solver
 - Exposure to financial industry (such as trading, hedge fund, etc.)

Perks of the job include: 
 - Learn trading techniques for a trader whose been trading professionally for 6 years
 - Receive a share of the fund's profit based on the contribution you give
 - Live at a revolutionary co-live co-creation space Bali www.thenyx.io

jobs.title: Signal Feed Operation & Trade Execution Role at Crypto Fund
jobs.description:
**Role**  
The ideal candidate will perform two primary duties: signal feed operations and trade exectution. 

The signal feed is the heart of our operation; the markets we’re interested in are processed by our market state models and signaling system. This allows us to discover new trading opportunities and assess risk on new and open trades. Each signal produced will correspond to data required to set the trade up, this is then used to execute and log the trade. 

**Responsibilities**
* Periodically update signal feed for each market we are trading.
* Execute trades on exchange.
* Enter data into a trade log spreadsheet.
* General portfolio management (if qualified).

**Requirements** 
* Excellent understanding of trading.
* Understanding of quantitative analysis.
* Appreciation for technical analysis.
* Excellent understanding of crypto exchange interfaces.
* Excellent bookkeeping skills.
* Understanding of portfolio management.
* Understanding of risk management and statistics.
* Highly attentive.
*  Est. time requirement: ~30 min per hour, 8 hours per day. 

**Compensation**
We are offering:
* A profit share model in the system. Current AUM is $400k 
* $1,000 stipend after a 4 week period of system operation 
* Potential to upgrade to a salary

**Company description**
CryptoAI is at an exciting period in its development. We have been researching and developing trading models that take advantage of market inefficiencies for 6 years. Over the last 2 years we have been consolidating our work into what is now an end-to-end trading system. At its core the system is a hybrid of trend-following and mean-reversion techniques that allow us to trade within a broad range of timeframes.  

Our mid term goal is to build a semi-automated system which allows us to trade many of markets/timeframes. See our road [roadmap](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jguYlgHCfS3jjahjYU6kMa58nyB37xTC/view). This document outlines the two departments which we are currently running in parallel. 

Our team is composed of computer scientists, physicists, statisticians and traders. More information on the funds history can be found [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15BAIyC1rfvxuStYU7xQ8wP7Y3yoQBWMy/view).
